PathOfBuilding.Notes:
==================================================================================================================== BUILD SPECIFIC ADVICE ====================================================================================================================
Poisonous Concoction scales off your life flask recovery (life number shown on the flask). It's important to maintain life flask charges so we use 2 Divine Life Flasks with Survival Secrets and Overflowing Chalice to maintain them during boss fights. Flask charge mods on belt or Flask Passives on the tree can help with this. Survival Secrets is in Act 2 Quest Reward from Through Sacred Ground which helps a lot.
Focus is a skill granted via focus crafts on gear, it's important to use focus on this build so prioritize getting these 3 crafts unlocked/crafted on your gear.
Ring --> Shock nearby enemies while focused Helm --> Increased duration of ailments inflicted while focused Gloves --> Increased attack or cast speed while focused
Plaguebearer is a toggle ability that stores poison damage and when toggled activates a chaos aura that deals damage to nearby enemies. It's your main clear ability so it's important to use this often.
Use an enduring mana flask until you switch to lifetap, make sure you don't overlevel vitality or precision and give yourself enough mana left over.
You can also play this as a Pathfinder which is more suitable for bossing. Nugiyen's take here --> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7AdlErLh5cU
==================================================================================================================== GENERAL TIPS ====================================================================================================================
Bandits: Kill All
The items in this guide are a GUIDELINE, listed with the main core stats you're looking for. More/higher stats (resists, attributes, etc) are always better! They are mostly kept reasonable and obtainable through self-crafting methods post-Harvest nerfs
On trade leagues you can search for "Empty Suffixes" or "Empty Prefixes" with a value of 1 for items with open crafting slots
Upgrade your Pantheons
Pantheons: Brine King for stun, chill and freeze + Garuhkan for shock, blind and maim
GEMS - ACT - NPC - QUEST
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Leveling --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1 - 12 Orb of Storms + Stormblast Mine
Freezing Pulse - Act 1 - Enemy at the Gate Arcane Surge - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
Stormblast Mine - Act 1 - Enemy at the Gate
4+ Frost Bomb + Movement (Replace Freezing Pulse for Frost Bomb)
Frost Bomb - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Frostblink - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Arcane Surge - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate
4+ Orb of Storms Orb of Storms - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
4+ Utility
Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs (Can put Steelskin on left mouse button to autocast it)
8+ Stormblast Mine
Stormblast Mine - Act 1 - Enemy at the Gate Swift Assembly - Act 1 - Nessa - Mercy Mission Added Lightning Damage - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
10+ Movement
Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
12+ Essence Drain + Contagion + Blight (NOTE - YOU WILL NEED
Essence Drain - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence Void Manipulation - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Efficacy - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Contagion - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Arcane Surge - Act 1 - Nessa - Enemy at the Gate Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Blight - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Void Manipulation - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Efficacy - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
Utility 18+
Wither - Act 1 - Nessa - The Siren's Cadence Spell Totem - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Faster Casting - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
16+ Auras + Utility
Summon Skitterbots - Act 2 - Yeena - Intruders in Black Arctic Armour - Act 2 - Yeena - Sharp and Cruel
24+ Curse Despair - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
38+ SWAP TO POISONOUS CONCOCTION
38+ Poisonous Concoction
Poisonous Concoction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Greater Multiple Projectiles - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Greater Volley - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Unbound Ailments - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute
38+ Auras
Grace - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Blasphemy - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Despair - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love Vitality - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
38+ Cast When Damage Taken
Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs
38+ Utility
Withering Step - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Plaguebearer - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Increased Area of Effect - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Ancestral Protector - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- End Game --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Poisonous Concoction
Poisonous Concoction - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Greater Multiple Projectiles - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Greater Volley - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Unbound Ailments - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Void Manipulation - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute Lifetap - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Withering Step + Plaguebearer + Ancestral Protector --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Withering Step - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Plaguebearer - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Increased Area of Effect - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Ancestral Protector - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Aura + Curse --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Grace - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Blasphemy - Act 4 - Petaurs and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare
Despair - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
Temporal Chains - Act 3 - Clarissa - Lost in Love
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Cast When Damage Taken + Aura + Movement --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cast When Damage Taken - Act 4 - Petarus and Vanja - The Eternal Nightmare Steelskin - Act 1 - Nessa - Breaking some Eggs Vitality - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
Flame Dash - Act 1 - Nessa - The Caged Brute (KEEP THIS UNLINKED FROM CAST WHEN DAMAGE TAKEN)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Movement + Aura --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Shield Charge - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Faster Attacks - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate Precision - Act 3 - Clarissa - A Fixture of Fate
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- TIPS --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Try to make sure you cap your resistances whenever possible (75, 75, 75)
You can see this from the defence Panel on your character screen if you press the default key C.
For everytime you kill Kitava your resistances will be reduced by 30 for a maximum of 60 reduced resistances after you kill Kitava the second time.
Get an Instant (Seething/Bubbling) Divine Life Flask as soon as you can. This flask is very important. Try to get as much life as you can on any piece of gear where-ever you can, for examples of gear, refer to the items section and click the drop down menu between Early and End game.
